com.kelsonprime.cardtree
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  com.kelsonprime.cardtree.Node

public class Node
extends java.lang.Object

Tree node that holds the view to render, optional options menu, and a possible child level. Should probably not be extended, use a custom android.view.View instead.

Constructor Summary
Node(View view)
          Create view for a level
Node(View view, java.lang.Integer menuRes)
          Create a view with a resource that will be inflated via #android.view.MenuInflater on tap.
Node(View view, Level child)
          Create a view with a child #Level that will be moved to on tap.
